name: Short Day - Long Night
description:
The cities of your tiny planet are in peril, horrible monsters spawns during the night, and it's your duty to slay them to avoid total destruction.

Kill monsters and survive as long as you can to get some nice score points.

Controls:

Arrow Keys / D-Pad / Left Stick -> Move
Space Key / Z Key / X-B-A-Y -> Attack
